p: Human carboxylesterase 1 (hCE1), a serine hydrolase distributed in liver and adipocytes, is highly associated with type 2 diabetes and hypertriglyceridemia [ 90]. It was reported that UNA displayed strong inhibitory activity against hCE1 (IC 50 = 0.037 µM), and this effect was more powerful than the activity of ULA (IC 50 = 0.24 µM) [ 90].
